Product Name: Chotto Motto Crispy Chilli Oil 212 ml

Reviews.Review Text: I really love this chilli oil, i always make sure i have at least 2 jars in my cupboard. But this time 2 of the three jars leaked in transit.
Not crispy or spicy enough, would prefer lao gan ma which is 1/4 price

I was initially disappointed with this oil because I was expecting with more crunch. But as I’ve used it more, I’ve come to really like it. I just use a tiny amount to enhance flavours as I can’t tolerate too much chilli. It’s actually quite good.

Loved this chili oil for the texture and su the chili flavours, for those who are looking for a spicy kick I would recommend something, but this is a great chili oil for those who van tolerate mild spice only

I wasn’t a fan of this one. I was expecting the garlic and onion pieces to be crunchy but most of the ingredients were chewy and the garlic still had quite a raw uncooked flavour to it.

The oil flavour itself is nice but the texture isn’t what I’d describe as “Crispy”
I put it on almost everything - I have gone through half a jar already and I’m already thinking I need a backup jar - and I want to give it as a present to all my sisters - it’s fantastic!
Loved this. Great crunchy bits and nice and smoky. Not too hot.
This stuff is amazing. I used it on a very bland lasagne to give it a boost and it was so tasty. Full of delicious crispy garlic, you will definitely need a mint afterwards
This oil is absolutely delicious. I have bought another 2 jars.

This taste is phenomenal, I’ve devoured a jar in under a fortnight. I put it on everything, eggs, sandwiches, cereal, icecream. It’s just so addictive. My wife thinks I have a problem. I think she’ll leave me and take the kids. She thinks that using chilli oil is an insult to her cooking. And it makes me gassy, and I smell like something has died inside of me.

I got off track. Oil is great. Too expensive to use it like I want to. I’ll have to remortgage the house to buy more after my wife takes the kids to her mums.
